name: _transfer (alpha)
description:
FULL VERSION NOW AVAILABLE HERE

A game about computers, memory, and identity.


"Is there anybody out there?"


Developed by Hyacinth Nil, written by Reed Lewis

(Content warning: this game contains some depictions of sex and coercive sex)

"haunting, disorienting, and really intriguing" -- Miss N, FemHype

"dark, fashioned only with unnerving sounds and dimly lit text...is the world of transfer" -- Amber Knox, KillScreen

"....no one gives a straight answer as to who they are, and viewing this through the lens of an old PC interface reflects on the disconnect between how you're interacting with them..." -- Mark Carr, Indie Game Searchlight
